reports.title: Player harassing others
reports.details: This player was harassing others in the game by blocking roads and insulting people.

notes.text: I've spoken to the player and issued a warning.
notes.author: mod_user

reports.title: Game crashes when entering police station
reports.details: The game consistently crashes when I try to enter the main police station building.

notes.text: Investigating this issue. Seems to be related to recent game update.
notes.author: admin_user

notes.text: Found the issue. Working on a fix.
notes.author: admin_user

reports.title: Add more ambulance vehicles
reports.details: It would be great to have more variety in ambulance vehicles, maybe add an SUV ambulance?

notes.text: Good suggestion. I'll forward this to the development team.
notes.author: mod_john

notes.text: Development team has approved this. New vehicles will be added in the next update.
notes.author: manager_user

reports.title: Ban appeal - wrongfully banned
reports.details: I was banned for supposedly using hacks, but I wasn't. Please review my case.

notes.text: Reviewed the evidence. The ban was justified as the video clearly shows speed hacking.
notes.author: mod_sarah

notes.text: Double-checked the evidence. Ban will remain in place.
notes.author: admin_user

reports.title: Discord invite link not working
reports.details: The Discord invite link on the website isn't working. It says it's expired.

notes.text: Fixed the Discord invite link. It was set to expire after 7 days.
notes.author: admin_user
